mapper.select: select * from PersonX where (id=(select MAX(id) from (select id from PersonX where name="西B内饰")) )
select * from PersonX where (id=(select MAX(id) from (select id from PersonX where name="西B底盘")) )
select * from PersonX where (id=(select MAX(id) from (select id from PersonX where name="西B门线")) )
select * from PersonX where (id=(select MAX(id) from (select id from PersonX where name="西B终线")) )
select * from PersonX where (id=(select MAX(id) from (select id from PersonX where name="西C内饰")) )
select * from PersonX where (id=(select MAX(id) from (select id from PersonX where name="西C底盘")) )
select * from PersonX where (id=(select MAX(id) from (select id from PersonX where name="西C门线")) )
select * from PersonX where (id=(select MAX(id) from (select id from PersonX where name="西C终线")) )
select * from PersonX where (id=(select MAX(id) from (select id from PersonX where name="西部调试")) )
select * from PersonX where (date >=#{date1} and date <= #{date2}) and (name="西B内饰")
select * from PersonX where (date >=#{date1} and date <= #{date2}) and (name="西B底盘")
select * from PersonX where (date >=#{date1} and date <= #{date2}) and (name="西B门线")
select * from PersonX where (date >=#{date1} and date <= #{date2}) and (name="西B终线")
select * from PersonX where (date >=#{date1} and date <= #{date2}) and (name="西C内饰")
select * from PersonX where (date >=#{date1} and date <= #{date2}) and (name="西C底盘")
select * from PersonX where (date >=#{date1} and date <= #{date2}) and (name="西C门线")
select * from PersonX where (date >=#{date1} and date <= #{date2}) and (name="西C终线")
select * from PersonX where (date >=#{date1} and date <= #{date2}) and (name="西部调试")
mapper.insert: insert into PersonX( region, personalLeave, sickLeave, annualLeave, nursingLeave, bereavementLeave) values(#{region},#{personalLeave},#{sickLeave},#{annualLeave},#{nursingLeave},#{bereavementLeave})
